text: Na ujjhānasaññī paresaṃ pattaṃ olokessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na ujjhānasaññī paresaṃ pattaṃ olokessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 38. I will not look at another's bowl intent on finding fault: a training to be observed.
๓๘. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่เพ่งโพนทะนาแลดูบาตรของผู้อื่น”
38. I shall not look finding fault with another's bowl: this is a training to be done.
